name: Produce Plaza
description:
Produce Plaza

Help a young girl set up for a farmers market in this cozy arcade game!

How To Play

Use your mouse to click the menus, pick up produce from the inventory, and place produce in crates!

  • Left click - click button / pick up produce / place produce
  • Right click - (when holding produce) return held produce to inventory

The goal of each level is to score the largest amount of points you can! Every piece of fruit has unique modifiers on them, so you'll have to use your wits to find the most favorable layouts! Here's a list of the modifiers for reference (also explained in-game):

  • All produce: 10 points when placed in the grid!
  • Apples: +10 points for every adjacent apple
  • Pears: +10 points for every adjacent fruit (apples or pears)
  • Turnips: +10 points for every adjacent empty crate
  • Carrots: x2 multiplier for every adjacent pair of carrots
  • Onions: x3 multiplier for 3 onions in a row, horiztonally or vertically

In this game, adjacent means horizontal and vertical, but DOES NOT INCLUDE diagonal crates.
